page.title: 03OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Throstle Farm Middle and First schools are situated on Hazel Road.In the middle school the{day begins at 9.00 {a.m.and ends at 3.30 p.m.}There are 8 class bases,a main hall,a music room which doubles up as a library,craft and cooking areas,2 offices,a staff room and several stock rooms and toilet areas.There are{120 children in {the middle school aged between 8 and {12.}Most of the time we stay with our own teacher but in the 4th.year we begin to move around for French, mapwork,music and R.E.with different teachers. We have assembly in the hall and sometimes classes do plays for us to watch.We do school plays as well at Christmas and sometimes in the summer. There are extensive playing areas and fields which are excellent for all types of sports and games.
